Aug. 27, 1903 D Ellesmere Contest
Ellesmere Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
ellesmere-contest

Own Choice from a Specified List
Ellesmere, Shropshire March contest - 1st Codpoeth, 2nd Middlewich. Brymbo were place 1st in both contests but were disqualified for playing professional players. 4 bands competed.
July 29, 2016, 6:58 a.m. Aug. 19, 2018, 10:04 a.m.
1 Coedpoeth Public Edward Roberts Gems of British Song [arr. Round]
2 Middlewich Centenary Band John James Brady Casket of Gems
3 Tarporley G. Lindop Casket of Gems
Disqualified Brymbo Steel Works Christopher Smith Casket of Gems
